title: Flights & Flatbread with Honig
description:
Join us on Tuesday, August 26, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for a special evening of wine and flatbread featuring Honig Vineyard & Winery—a Napa Valley family estate known for sustainable winemaking and outstanding Cabernet and Sauvignon Blanc.

Tasting Fee: $40 (Includes a flatbread and tasting)

With Special Guest:

Steven Honig, Director of California Sales

Featured Wines:

• Honig Bartolucci Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Richly textured with plum, floral spice, and cocoa-powder tannins; built to age yet enjoyable now.

• Honig Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Classic Napa Cab with aromas and flavors of currant, plum, black raspberry, and sweet oak.

• Honig Reserve Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – Elegant and layered with honeydew, jasmine, and lime curd over a mineral-driven finish.

• Honig Sauvignon Blanc 2023 – Bright and vibrant with grapefruit, lemongrass, tropical fruit, and floral lift.

Explore Honig’s sustainably crafted wines—your $35 ticket includes both a flatbread and this curated flight.
